titleStmt.title: A letter from Sir George Ayskew, Vice Admirall of Ireland, of a great and famous victory obtained by Col: Jones, in the utter routing, and defeating of the Marquesse of Ormond and his whole army..
titleStmt.author: Ayscue, George, Sir, fl. 1646-1671.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed: Dublin. Bay 5 August 1649, your servant Georg Ayskew.
Imperfect: copies at reels C5:1[112] and C29:2[102] trimmed at head, affecting title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
